casebody.data:
EDISON FIXTURE COMPANY, INCORPORATED PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. FRANK SHAPIRO, TRADING, ETC., DEFENDANT-APPELLEE. Argued October 8, 1924 Decided February 5, 1925.

Before Justices Tren chard, Minturn and Lloyd.

For the appellant, Herman B. J. Wechstein. For the appellee, Thomas P. Curley. Pee Curiam.

This case was argued with, and is controlled by, our decision in Edison Fixture Co., Inc., v. Copoulos, No. 475, of the present term.

The judgment will be reversed and a venire de novo awarded.
